developers.name: What are the top 10 websites a web developer must see?
developers.description: Over the years, here are my top websites that every web developer must see and examine indepth and why I believe they are important

developers.name: How can developers improve productivity?
developers.description: As many others careers there are tips or ways to get a better personal future, here i will tell you some tips that will increase your Software Development Productivity

developers.name: Want to learn web development but don’t know where to start?
developers.description: So, you’re interested in learning web development and becoming a web developer? First of all, congratulations. You’ve made a great choice.

developers.name: How to start Android app development for complete beginners?
developers.description: So you have a killer app idea and you’re ready to turn it into a reality and take it to market. No doubt you’re itching to start getting your first downloads, reviews and profits… But there’s just one problem: you don’t have a clue where to start!
